root_object.name: AS GSS Generate Vendor Factor Summary Document

process_model.name: AS GSS Generate Vendor Factor Summary Document
process_model.description: Process to generate a factor/subfactor summary document per vendor

inputs.input_expression: = rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationResponses( returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY, additionalFilters: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "taskId", operator: "in", value: index(pv!ratings, "taskId", null) ) })

outputs.output_expression:
rule!AS_GSS_UT_formatEvaluationFactorSummaryCommentsSection(
  vendorRatingDetails:pv!ratings,
  childRatingTypes: pv!childRatingTypes,
  evaluationResponses: ac!evaluationResponses,
  evaluation: pv!evaluation
)

constants.description: Value: space that can be used as a separator

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
expression_rules.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_UT_concatUserFirstNameLastName
expression_rules.description: Returns the Concatenated Format of First Name and Last Name with any separator

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_formatEvaluationFactorSummaryCommentsSection
expression_rules.description: Rule to format evaluation vendor factor summary section of doc

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!evaluatorNickNames: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getMaskEvaluatorDetails(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: ri!evaluation.evaluationId
  ),
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!vendorRatingDetails),
    "No comments available",
    concat(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!vendorRatingDetails,
        expression: concat(
          "</w:t></w:r></w:p>",
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_generateTextForDocument(
            text: concat(
              "Evaluator",
              ": ",
              /*Mask Evaluators name if flag is set to true*/
              if(
                ri!evaluation.isEvaluatorMasked= true(),
                rule!AS_GSS_UT_returnNickName(
                  userNames: fv!item.modifiedBy,
                  nickNamesList: local!evaluatorNickNames
                ),
                rule!AS_GAM_UT_concatUserFirstNameLastName(
                  firstName: user(fv!item.modifiedBy, "firstName"),
                  lastName: user(fv!item.modifiedBy, "lastName")
                )
              )
            ),
            fontStyle: "Calibri",
            paraId: fv!index
          ),
          "<w:br/>",
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_generateTextForDocument(
            text: "Rating" & ": " & index(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                cdt: ri!childRatingTypes,
                field: "ratingId",
                value: fv!item.finalRatingId
              ),
              "label",
              {}
            ),
            fontStyle: "Calibri",
            paraId: fv!index
          ),
          "<w:br/>",
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_generateTextForDocument(
            text: "Rating Justification" & ": " & rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
              nullableValue: fv!item.justification,
              replacementValue: "-"
            ),
            fontStyle: "Calibri",
            paraId: fv!index
          ),
          "<w:br/>",
          "<w:p><w:r><w:t>",
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_createDynamicTableSectionForVendorRatingDocument(
            evaluationResponses: rule!AS_CO_UT_sortCdt(
              cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                cdt: ri!evaluationResponses,
                field: "taskId",
                value: fv!item.taskId
              ),
              field: "responseId",
              ascending: true
            ),
            bundle: local!bundle
          ),
          "<w:br/>
<w:br/>"
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.description: Returns text that can be used in an OOXML code.

test_inputs.input_value: "Strength: Proposal & requirements and indicates a thorough approach and understanding of the environment. The vendor utilizes sound IT governance practices and the proposed framework of select, control, evaluate aligns with our strategic direction. The vendor's plan to retain executive level sponsorship through tech enablement working groups and interagency councils is favorable and a new approach."

"Our agency has recently undergone leadership changes with the new administration. As part of this change, it is important for our agency to work with other agencies in our department to move towards our new goals. Establishing an interagency council will allow us to learn from our peers and adopt their best practices and share ours. Additionally, keeping leadership involved will increase support and awareness of our initiative to improve IT packages."

  "<w:p w:rsidR=""" & "00000000" & """ w:rsidDel=""" & "00000000" & """ w:rsidP=""" & "00000000" & """ w:rsidRDefault=""" & "00000000" & """ w:rsidRPr=""" & "00000000" & """ w14:paraId=""" & concat("0000000", ri!paraId) & """>
    <w:pPr>
      <w:rPr>
      <w:rFonts w:ascii=" & concat("""", ri!fontStyle, """") & " w:cs=" & concat("""", ri!fontStyle, """") & " w:eastAsia=" & concat("""", ri!fontStyle, """") & " w:hAnsi=" & concat("""", ri!fontStyle, """") & "/>

      <w:rPr>

        <w:rtl w:val=""" & "0" & """/>
      </w:rPr>
      <w:t xml:space=" & concat("""", "preserve", """") & ">" & local!text & "</w:t>
    </w:r>
  </w:p>"
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation criteria details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)
